entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is being chased by the Bludger and trying to catch the Golden Snitch.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A rival student of Harry's, who is laughing at him as he tries to dodge the Bludger. He doesn't see the Golden Snitch hovering above his ear.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A ball used in Quidditch that is being thrown by the Beaters. It hits Harry's elbow and breaks it.

entities.name: golden snitch
entities.description: The object of the game, a small golden ball that must be caught to win points for one's team.

entities.name: harry's arm
entities.description: Harry's arm is broken by the Bludger.

relationships.description: The Bludger hits Harry's elbow and breaks his arm.
The Golden Snitch is hovering inches above Malfoy's left ear, but he doesn't see it.
